# Typography

## How to use Typography ?

You can either refer the typography from the canvas tab and create your own css / s(a|c)ss files
or you can use the exported `style-dictonary/typography.scss` file from the library with the below approach

### Variables defined in `typography.scss`

Please note that the variable names follow the below scheme
`typography-groupName-typeName-property`

```scss
/**
 * Do not edit directly, this file was auto-generated.
 */

$typography-scale-h1-font-size: 32px !default;
$typography-scale-h1-line-height: 32px !default;
$typography-scale-h1-letter-spacing: 0px !default;
$typography-weight-bold: 700 !default;

$typography: (
  'typography': (
    'scale': (
      'h1': (
        'font-size': $typography-scale-h1-font-size,
        'line-height': $typography-scale-h1-line-height,
        'letter-spacing': $typography-scale-h1-letter-spacing,
      ),
    ),
    'weight': (
      'bold': $typography-weight-bold,
    ),
  ),
);
```
